name: Reset Button
description: Allows to reset all filters at once in Tableau
longDescription: The reset filter extension resets all filters without any configuration effort. Data filter and action filter also get reset, relative data filter will persist.
notice: It will not work in Tableau Mobile fow now
You will have to migrate your dashboard at some point when we switch to a productive version

name: Live Refresh
description: Allows a continous live refresh of live data connections in Tableau
